markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eternal Wings (Sylph)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2603) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wings of Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=2600)

</column>

---

Your wings are now a permanent part of your body. You gain the effects of Wings of Air at all times rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.
name: Eternal Wings (Sylph)
